name: Sunshine Kaidi (Finland) New Energy Co. Oy
goal: Kaidi’s goal is to enable world-class bioenergy production in Finland. The company plans to build a biodiesel refinery in Kemi, northern Finland that will produce 2nd generation advanced biofuels, biodiesel and biogasoline. Sunshine Kaidi New Energy Group, one of China’s largest biorefining actors and the owner of Kaidi Finland, began the preparation of the Kemi biorefinery project in 2014. Kaidi Finland and its headquarters are located in Helsinki, Finland.
euInitiatives:
- Energy union; sustainable bioenergy policy; REDII; renewables 2030 targets, circular economy, waste directive
- Decarbonisation of transport; capping emissions on non-ETS sectors; mobility package
- ILUC, LULUCF
-InnovFin
